name: Easy Hoppin' John
author: DONIGL
summary: An easy week night dinner that my kids love. Have it with a nice salad, and dinner is done. The red pepper should be adjusted to fit your family's taste.
ingredients: 1 pound smoked beef sausage, cut into bite-size pieces
3 (15 ounce) cans black-eyed peas, rinsed and drained
2 (10.75 ounce) cans  low sodium chicken stock
½ teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste
directions: Place the sausage and onion into a large saucepan over medium heat, and cook and stir until the sausage begins to brown, about 10 minutes
Stir in the black-eyed peas, chicken stock, water, and cayenne pepper, and bring to a boil
Stir in the rice, cover, and cook, stirring occasionally, until the rice is tender, 20 to 25 minutes
